file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: "3.0.0"

info:
  title: "Quality Sphere"
  version: "2.0.0"

servers:
  - url: http://0.0.0.0/api
  - url: http://192.168.99.100/api

tags:
  - name: "check"
  - name: "tracker"
  - name: "project"
  - name: "sprint"
  - name: "issue"

paths:
  /status:
    get:
      tags:
        - "check"
      description: "Check Health Status"
      operationId: api.apiHealth.health_check
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Service status is healthy"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "healthy"

  /hosts:
    get:
      tags:
        - "check"
      description: "Get Host Status"
      operationId: api.apiHealth.host_check
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list all hosts status"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    host:
                      type: string
                      example: "127.0.0.1"
                    status:
                      type: string
                      example: "online"


  /trackers:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "List All Trackers"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.list_tracker
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list all trackers and return tracker info object"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    name:
                      type: string
                    type:
                      type: string
                    info:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        host:
                          type: string
                        account:
                          type: string
                    status:
                      type: string
    post:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Add Tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.add_tracker
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "MyTracker"
                type:
                  type: string
                  example: 'jira'
                info:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    host:
                      type: string
                      example: "http://qualitysphere.github.io"
                    account:
                      type: string
                      example: "admin"
                token:
                  type: string
                  example: "PassWord"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to add tracker and return tracker ID"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"

  /tracker/{tracker_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Get tracker information"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.get_tracker
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to get tracker and return tracker info object"
    put:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Update tracker information"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.update_tracker
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 'e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "MyTracker"
                type:
                  type: string
                  example: "jira"
                info:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    host:
                      type: string
                      example: "https://qualitysphere.github.io"
                    account:
                      type: string
                      example: "admin"
                token:
                  type: string
                  example: "PassWord"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to update tracker and return tracker ID"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
    delete:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Delete tracker information"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.delete_tracker
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        204:
          description: "succeed to delete tracker and return True"

  /tracker/{tracker_id}/status:
    put:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Active/Disable tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.update_tracker_status
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  example: "active"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to update tracker status and return tracker status"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "active"

  /tracker/{tracker_id}/projects:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "List project from tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.list_tracker_project
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list project from tracker and return projects"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    key:
                      type: string
                    value:
                      type: string

  /tracker/{tracker_id}/sprints:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "List sprint from tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.list_tracker_sprint
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list sprint from tracker and return sprints"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    key:
                      type: string
                    value:
                      type: string

  /tracker/{tracker_id}/issue_fields:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "List issue fields from tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.list_tracker_issue_field
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list issue field from tracker and return issue fields"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    key:
                      type: string
                    value:
                      type: string

  /tracker/{tracker_id}/issue_field:
    get:
      tags:
        - "tracker"
      description: "Get issue field values from tracker"
      operationId: api.apiTracker.list_tracker_issue_field_value
      parameters:
        - name: tracker_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
        - name: field
          in: query
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "label"
        - name: project
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "QS"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to get issue field values from tracker and return values"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    key:
                      type: string
                    value:
                      type: string


  /projects:
    get:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "List All Projects"
      operationId: api.apiProject.list_project
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list project and return projects"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    name:
                      type: string
                    issue_tracker:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        tracker_name:
                          type: string
                        project_value:
                          type: string
                    case_tracker:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        tracker_name:
                          type: string
                        project_value:
                          type: string
                    status:
                      type: string
    post:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "Add Project"
      operationId: api.apiProject.add_project
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "MyProject"
                issue_tracker:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    tracker_id:
                      type: string
                      example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
                    project_key:
                      type: string
                      example: "QS"
                    project_value:
                      type: string
                      example: "QSphere"
                case_tracker:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    tracker_id:
                      type: string
                      example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
                    project_key:
                      type: string
                      example: "QS"
                    project_value:
                      type: string
                      example: "QSphere"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to add project and return project ID"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"

  /project/{project_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "Get Project"
      operationId: api.apiProject.get_project
      parameters:
        - name: project_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to get project"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                  name:
                    type: string
                  issue_tracker:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      tracker_id:
                        type: string
                      tracker_name:
                        type: string
                      project_key:
                        type: string
                      project_value:
                        type: string
                  case_tracker:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      tracker_id:
                        type: string
                      tracker_name:
                        type: string
                      project_key:
                        type: string
                      project_value:
                        type: string
                  status:
                    type: string
    put:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "Update Project"
      operationId: api.apiProject.update_project
      parameters:
        - name: project_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "MyProject"
                issue_tracker:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    tracker_id:
                      type: string
                      example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
                    project_key:
                      type: string
                      example: "QS"
                    project_value:
                      type: string
                      example: "QSphere"
                case_tracker:
                  type: object
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to update project"
    delete:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "Delete Project"
      operationId: api.apiProject.delete_project
      parameters:
        - name: project_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        204:
          description: "succeed to delete project"

  /project/{project_id}/status:
    put:
      tags:
        - "project"
      description: "Active/Disable Project"
      operationId: api.apiProject.update_project_status
      parameters:
        - name: project_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  example: "active"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to update project status and return project's status"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "active"


  /sprints:
    get:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "List All Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.list_sprint
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to list sprint and return sprint objects"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: string
                    name:
                      type: string
                    project_name:
                      type: string
                    status:
                      type: string
    post:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "Add Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.add_sprint
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "Qsphere 1.1"
                project_id:
                  type: string
                  example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
                issue_config:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    sprint:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                          example: "sprint"
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                    requirement:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "support JIRA"
                            - "case process"
                    version:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "qsphere1.1"
                    rc:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "RC1"
                            - "RC2"
                            - "RC3"
                    type:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Improvement"
                            - "Defect"
                    since:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        newfeature:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "NewFeature"
                        improve:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "RegressionImprove"
                        customer:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Customer"
                        qamissed:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "QAMissed"
                    category:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        newfeature:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "NewFeature"
                        regression:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Regression"
                        previous:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Previous"
                    status:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        fixing:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "backlog"
                            - "new"
                            - "fixing"
                        fixed:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "fixed"
                        verified:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "verified"
                case_config:
                  type: object
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to add sprint and return sprint ID"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
                example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"

  /sprint/{sprint_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "Get Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.get_sprint
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to get sprint and return sprint info object"
    delete:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "Delete Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.delete_sprint
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        204:
          description: "succeed to delete sprint"
    put:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "Update Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.update_sprint
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                name:
                  type: string
                  example: "Qsphere 1.1"
                project_id:
                  type: string
                  example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
                issue_config:
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    sprint:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                          example: "sprint"
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                    requirement:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "support JIRA"
                            - "case process"
                    version:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "qsphere1.1"
                    rc:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "RC1"
                            - "RC2"
                            - "RC3"
                    type:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        value:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Improvement"
                            - "Defect"
                    since:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        newfeature:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "NewFeature"
                        improve:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "RegressionImprove"
                        customer:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Customer"
                        qamissed:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "QAMissed"
                    category:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        newfeature:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "NewFeature"
                        regression:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Regression"
                        previous:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "Previous"
                    status:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        field:
                          type: string
                        fixing:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "backlog"
                            - "new"
                            - "fixing"
                        fixed:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "fixed"
                        verified:
                          type: array
                          items:
                            type: string
                          example:
                            - "verified"
                case_config:
                  type: object
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to update sprint and return sprint ID"

  /sprint/{sprint_id}/status:
    put:
      tags:
        - "sprint"
      description: "Active/Disable Sprint"
      operationId: api.apiSprint.update_sprint_status
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to active sprint"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string


  /issue/sync:
    get:
      tags:
        - "issue"
      description: "Sync Sprint(s) Issue Data"
      operationId: api.apiIssue.sync_issue_data
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to sync data from issue tracker server"

  /issue/status:
    get:
      tags:
        - "issue"
      description: "Get Sprint(s) Bug Verification Status"
      operationId: api.apiIssue.get_issue_status
      parameters:
        - name: sprint_id
          in: query
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "e095081f-b145-4df7-affa-0412fce2ea88"
      responses:
        200:
          description: "succeed to get sprint issue status"
